lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola has shrugged off suggestions of a potential conflict of interest after signing with Premier League's Manchester City for next season, saying he was quite capable of mult-tasking.

headline.print_headline: Multi-Tasking No Problem for Man City-Bound Guardiola
headline.main: Multi-Tasking No Problem for Man City-Bound Guardiola

snippet: Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola has shrugged off suggestions of a potential conflict of interest after signing with Premier League's Manchester City for next season, saying he was quite capable of mult-tasking....
